channel.title: How to add items to a shop?
channel.description:
I'm trying to add more items to a particular shop.
How could I do this?
Thanks.

item.title: How to add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Duke_Nukem Duke Nukem
item.description:
@Duke_Nukem wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:2, topic:354188”]shops.cfg

Search for the shop you wanna edit and go all the way to the end, put the item id and then the amount you want. Remember to use Tab Spaces.[/quote]

Thanks!

Can someone tell me how to define a price? When I put new items in they all come to be 500gp.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add items to a shop?

item.title: How to add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

shops.cfg

Search for the shop you wanna edit and go all the way to the end, put the item id and then the amount you want. Remember to use Tab Spaces.
